Index.title: ROCSTONES BÉTON CIRÉ
Index.description: The art of mineral application for your exceptional projects.

Intro.label: BÉTON CIRÉ
Intro.title: Dress your interior with style.
Intro.subtitle: An artisanal and flawless installation to transform your floors and walls into exceptional seamless surfaces.

beton.title: RocStones Béton Ciré
beton.desc: A seamless finish that pushes the boundaries of elegance.
beton.charme_title: What makes the charm of waxed concrete in modern interiors?
beton.charme_text: Béton ciré is perfect for covering both your floors and your walls. Hand-trowelled until a continuous surface is obtained — with or without effects, according to your tastes —, its thinness makes it a choice covering for renovations or new constructions. This durable material features a wide color palette and is compatible with underfloor heating. It is notably used as an interesting alternative to tiling.
beton.avantages_title: What are the advantages of waxed concrete?
beton.avantages_text: This durable material features a wide color palette and is compatible with underfloor heating. It is notably used as an interesting alternative to tiling.

walls.title: Architectural Concrete Walls
walls.intro_title: The raw character of concrete, the finesse of design.
walls.desc: Creating concrete textures on interior walls and facades for a contemporary look.
walls.what_text: Architectural Concrete Walls represent a decorative concrete wall covering, perfectly suited for both interior and exterior use. Rocstones offers Concrete Walls with various patterns and textures to give your home or commercial premises an aesthetic, modern, and architectural look.
walls.why_title: WHY CHOOSE ROCSTONES ARCHITECTURAL CONCRETE WALLS?
walls.why_durability_text: A concrete wall covering will be resistant to impacts and the wear and tear of time. Even after several years, your walls will retain their original appearance.
walls.why_aesthetic_text: Adapted to several decorative styles such as urban, loft, grunge, or architectural style. This coating will allow you to achieve the desired look.
walls.why_app_text: Thanks to its experienced team, Rocstones guarantees an impeccable result that will not crack over time.
walls.motifs_text: It is a very malleable coating, which allows for a large number of styles and patterns. It adapts perfectly to the style of your interior.

micro.title: High-Precision Micro-Cement
micro.desc: Ultra-thin renovation solution adapting to all substrates without demolition.
micro.adv_1_d: The thickness is only 2 to 3 mm, which means no need to change floors or raise doors.
micro.adv_2_d: Waterproof material, highly resistant to impacts, scratches, and chemicals.
micro.adv_3_d: Seamless surface. Simple cleaning with water and neutral soap is enough.
micro.finishes_desc: RocStones micro-cement adapts to all styles thanks to its multiple finishes.
micro.f_mat_d: Gives the most natural and organic look to your coating.
micro.f_sat_d: The most popular finish, bringing a modern and subtle feel.
micro.f_pol_d: Allows for a marbled effect and brings out colors to the maximum.
micro.f_ant_d: Ideal for bathrooms or any surface with high-slip risk.
micro.proc_desc: Artisanal expertise for a flawless technical result.
micro.step_1_d: Ensuring a clean, dry, and perfectly smooth surface.
micro.step_2_d: Ensuring bonding. A fiberglass mesh is also applied for flexibility.
micro.step_3_d: Applying finishing layers to achieve the desired texture and color.
micro.step_4_d: Two coats of treated polyurethane are applied to guarantee waterproofing and protection.

WhyBeton.title: Why choose our Béton Ciré?
WhyBeton.item1_desc: Each surface is hand-trowelled, creating a unique and organic texture.
WhyBeton.item2_desc: Compatible with underfloor heating and applicable to almost any existing substrate.
WhyBeton.item3_desc: Extreme resistance to daily wear while maintaining its pure mineral appearance.

Professionals.title: Partner for Professionals
Professionals.collab_title: SEIZE THE OPPORTUNITY TO COLLABORATE WITH US
Professionals.collab_text_1: Waxed concrete has seen strong growth in recent years, becoming a key market. Thanks to its aesthetic appeal, it is now integrated into the most prestigious homes and establishments.
Professionals.collab_text_2: We accompany design experts in creating complex mineral surfaces, combining high performance technical and bespoke aesthetics.
Professionals.why_subtitle: RocStones is the exclusive manufacturer and exporter of waxed concrete in Morocco.
Professionals.why_text_1: Our expertise in the manufacturing and application of waxed concrete allows us to always guarantee perfect customer satisfaction. We are convinced of the future of waxed concrete and seek partners to join us in this mission.
Professionals.partner_title: MORE THAN A SUPPLIER, A REAL PARTNER
Professionals.partner_list_1: RocStones doesn't just sell its product, but also offers real support to ensure optimal customer satisfaction.
Professionals.partner_list_2: Upon the first order, we also deliver the RocStones application manual. A detailed manual with a practical approach.
Professionals.partner_list_3: Furthermore, we train and advise our applicators to avoid technical problems. We apply an exclusive anti-cracking system.
Professionals.colors_text: We have a wide range of carefully selected colors. Custom RAL colors are also available.
Professionals.finishes_list: Rocstones fine, Rocstones structured, Rocstones structured+, Rocstones façade.
Professionals.distribution_text: Distribution and installation throughout Morocco: Casablanca, Rabat, Marrakech, Agadir, Tangier...
Professionals.adv_1: Ready to use: Pre-mixed, easier and cleaner to apply.
Professionals.adv_2: Zero risk: Water-based, solvent-free, low VOC emissions.
Professionals.adv_3: Training included: Technical courses for our clients.
Professionals.adv_4: Economical: Surplus can be reused for the next project.
Professionals.support_desc: Substrate advice, custom RAL colors, and dedicated site monitoring.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Let's talk about your project. Our team of experts is at your disposal.

Footer.desc: Leading manufacturer and applicator of waxed concrete in Morocco.
Footer.zones_list: Casablanca, Rabat, Marrakech, Agadir, Tangier, Fes, Oujda...
